SkillEffect.PUSH:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a3492bb79b504d23b57586ae428243af" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Buff[System:Color name="Default"] skill enables him to move
things. It grants the power of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin—
enough to transport a castaway!
SkillEffect.PUSHLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="cb5730f3c2a8439ab89d156ac4fe48cb" Scale="1"/]Increasing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s strength makes him
better at physical tasks. With the brawn
of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]5 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin, he'll be even more effective!
SkillEffect.PUSHLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a0aa51f9ec1a4031ae530553c2d52532" Scale="1"/]With the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin,
exploration and transportation
efficiency is sure to improve.
SkillEffect.PUSHLV4:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e19e1abf8af94e6d8b09d425f7788f2d" Scale="1"/]What skill could be better than Buff?
How about [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Super Buff[System:Color name="Default"]! It gives [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]20 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin. Attaboy!
SkillEffect.PUSHLV5:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bf1026bbb6d04277b7e32c413069068f" Scale="1"/]With the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]30 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin rippling
through his body, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can transport
enormous creatures with ease.
SkillEffect.PUSHLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a6a538878650430bbedb62a3e31673e8" Scale="1"/]With the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]100 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
is top dog when it comes to transporting
things. Is there anything he can't carry?
SkillEffect.EATCARRY:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e5418b65577e42f1bf32b1bbc0427796" Scale="1"/]With this skill, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]swallow and
transport [System:Color name="Default"]things just like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. But
where does the stuff he swallows go?!
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0dd7e28486714f90a1cf80762e26fd8d" Scale="1"/]Your Rescue Pup isn't just cute and
cuddly. He's protective, too, and can
attack valiantly with [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Chomp[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="774797e13bf24f64bd22e77f21018dbd" Scale="1"/]When it comes to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sharpening your
Rescue Pup's attack[System:Color name="Default"] skill, the Chomp
journey is a long one. But worth it!
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="24fbd2c29e814cb5a09738fd6d157eaf" Scale="1"/]This Chomp is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]many times stronger [System:Color name="Default"]than
the original. For example, it can take
down a Pellet Posy in a single bite.
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV4:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8a11a64cb5a24e80bae0717e63b62697" Scale="1"/]With [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Big Chomp [System:Color name="Default"]skill, his wildest
instincts awaken, and he leaps at
creatures in the air!
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV5:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fc6baecb691c45efaa423b5ab1d1971c" Scale="1"/]Smaller creatures like Dwarf Bulborbs
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]don't stand a chance [System:Color name="Default"]against the power
of this Chomp.
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="43f79b9ec72742028f4403dc11aab1f8" Scale="1"/]This is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]most impressive Chomp[System:Color name="Default"]!
Even a horde of Pikmin can't match the
intensity and ferocity of this strike.
SkillEffect.RUSH:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9cad769ce4dd4651afb90acc4a644bc6" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush[System:Color name="Default"] is what you get when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
releases pent-up energy. The impact can
knock objects down and break them.
SkillEffect.RUSHLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2b64dd08f4a44b27a140879cb53599ce" Scale="1"/]This skill [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]shortens [System:Color name="Default"]the energy-charging
time [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]a little[System:Color name="Default"]. It's easier for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to
strike critters that are moving around.
SkillEffect.RUSHLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bb2dc318e64f484dbdbc101361ba1f02" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s leg strength increases, giving
him a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]more powerful impact [System:Color name="Default"]that can
defeat more creatures in a single attack.
SkillEffect.RUSHLV4:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ef1ff80138524a2f930ae4cdea423423" Scale="1"/]This [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mega Rush [System:Color name="Default"]gives [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the ability
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]stun [System:Color name="Default"]creatures! His energy charges
up even faster too.
SkillEffect.RUSHLV5:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0e9db658a8374ae88b8aeb939e09996b" Scale="1"/]This skill maximizes the shock from
impact,[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] increasing the damage[System:Color name="Default"] to
creatures.
SkillEffect.RUSHLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="387e5e26037a4d5aa7c1402b1b35c7e5" Scale="1"/]Impact, stun duration, energy-charging
speed... This pushes them all to the max.
It should be called the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ultra Mega Rush[System:Color name="Default"]!
SkillEffect.SWIM:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1f1ab6f125d44b23a7bee8604f1737e4" Scale="1"/]With this skill, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is able to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]swim[System:Color name="Default"].
Pikmin with a weakness to water can
even hop aboard and safely go for a ride.
SkillEffect.SWIMLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="04d37659cb464df585a9e653b86899c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]swim faster [System:Color name="Default"]when he masters
this skill level. Watch how smoothly he
speeds along the surface of the water!
SkillEffect.DIVE:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9063c4a583bf4642ba73766f53462ff4" Scale="1"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dives[System:Color name="Default"], he can transport
treasure from below the surface and
bite underwater creatures too!
SkillEffect.CARRYAVATAR:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3d9706aa7a13404ea4535f5080b24acf" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]carry you on his back[System:Color name="Default"],
helping you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]jump over [System:Color name="Default"]small ledges
when you need to. Talk about a good boy!
SkillEffect.NUKULV1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1dceb5ef1a1442039d3db05d0d35e8b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]help you[System:Color name="Default"] when you pluck
Pikmin sprouts!
SkillEffect.NUKULV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d2ab42a8e762467db53a2635c5a7c626" Scale="1"/]At this skill level, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can pluck
sprouts at a[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] faster speed[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.NUKULV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a91270a0eed6433e81c9fad56be92a1b" Scale="1"/]At this level, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a speedy [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sprout-
plucking prodigy[System:Color name="Default"]. Watch as sprouts get
plucked in the wag of a tail!
SkillEffect.DIGGING:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e22a6ee6855b4d78a97a62a3c6ebcf0b" Scale="1"/]With this skill, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] does what dogs do
best—[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dig[System:Color name="Default"]! He digs up dirt and any holes
you find. Dig away, doggy!
SkillEffect.DIGGINGLV2: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="cc4113ae70cb4c3aba27029353e27e13" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s digging [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]speeds up[System:Color name="Default"]!
SkillEffect.DIGGINGLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d20f377eff9d49cd8376f082717c47dc" Scale="1"/]At this level, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]digging master[System:Color name="Default"]!
He digs at a speed even Yellow Pikmin
can't match.
SkillEffect.SNIFF:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8ce88ccd7c0b4770a1a1d6212ff59364" Scale="1"/]With this, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] learns to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]distinguish
scents[System:Color name="Default"] so he can search for things like
castaways, treasure, and rare Pikmin.
SkillEffect.COME:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2afbdb266006491e8d87ebe10f0592ef" Scale="1"/]Use this skill to tell your partner to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]go to
your base[System:Color name="Default"] or to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]call them to you[System:Color name="Default"]. It also
enables [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Go Here [System:Color name="Default"]on the Radar Map.
SkillEffect.COLLECTPIKMIN:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6fb924657b954420acb82f12163e0199" Scale="1"/]If you get lost or you just need more
of them, you can direct [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gather
Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] for you when he learns this skill.
SkillEffect.REGENERATIONLV1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="da063a5197124c4591887997f376f6cf" Scale="1"/]This skill increases [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s healing
power. When he's injured, he'll [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]recover
[System:Color name="Default"]as long as he takes it easy.
SkillEffect.REGENERATIONLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a22131fff163473491c1136eedfefb74" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s healing power increases at this
level. That means he'll get [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]healthy faster[System:Color name="Default"].
Talk about a relief!
SkillEffect.REGENERATIONLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0403b4795c4c433fbe2e2ab475627602" Scale="1"/]Mastery of this level means [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has
nothing to fear! Even if he gets injured,
he'll be [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]full of pep again in no time[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.LASTSKILL:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="abbff3ffc454431b9aae94dd61cb8a9d" Scale="1"/]With this legendary skill, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gains
unlimited stamina. That means he's able
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]keep using Rush[System:Color name="Default"] forever!
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="55b755265c684aaaac0d357b4cc1299a" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]5 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin.
I think she'll be quite useful for moving
and transporting things.
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="162e94d0a20d4f07af6ccddfbeb5f7ca" Scale="1"/]Her strength is considerable. I've noticed
she can easily complete physical tasks
that usually require [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin.
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV4:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="bae5d158b7544ed7b897e5f35928203e" Scale="1"/]Now she has the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]20 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin!
"Super Buff" is accurate indeed!
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="951459492b664c3fa29474494ba0335b" Scale="1"/]It's amazing. Her strength is now equal
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]100 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin! I'm beyond grateful to
have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] at my side.
SkillEffect.Hero_EATCARRY:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="b4fd7bc2540f445186e3aab595dd78ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]swallow and transport [System:Color name="Default"]things.
It's almost miraculous. Where does she
store these objects in her body?
SkillEffect.Hero_ATTACKLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="fbc3df24e0654b06bd79e7438bcd7fa6" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Big Chomp [System:Color name="Default"]is a way of harnessing her
primal instincts. If she were to bite me
even once... Let's just say it would hurt.
SkillEffect.Hero_RUSHLV6:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="c080d7053ec54e3e9f8633ddb0014267" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mega Rush [System:Color name="Default"]is used to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]stun [System:Color name="Default"]creatures.
The impact can also break things or
make them fall down.
SkillEffect.Hero_SWIMLV2:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="5144aedbf8f24a28bbc768be2b93dc50" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is very proficient at swimming.
If any Pikmin are riding on her back, she
can carry them across the water too.
SkillEffect.Hero_CARRYAVATAR:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="94bad423697f423a91bd2487ad7b4f88" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] easily [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]jumps over[System:Color name="Default"] short ledges,
even while you're [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]riding on her back[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.Hero_NUKULV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="5d87c314b1b04de49cc19a31707ae3d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has quite the knack for [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]plucking
[System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sprouts[System:Color name="Default"]. Not to mention, she
gets the job done quick.
SkillEffect.Hero_DIGGINGLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="43bdf433c34c46d2a2f8f311f1c40617" Scale="1"/]She can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dig up the ground and excavate
holes [System:Color name="Default"]faster than the average dog.
SkillEffect.Hero_COLLECTPIKMIN:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="bb4bc5bf314d47289c753daddf1a8307" Scale="1"/]We can direct each other to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gather
[System:Color name="Default"]stray [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.Hero_REGENERATIONLV3:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="9a800c4bd0ca458192dfaa57675b9106" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s self-healing abilities are quite
powerful. If she gets hurt, she'll be
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]healthy again in no time[System:Color name="Default"].
SkillEffect.Hero_LASTSKILL:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="7fd7c4b6af8d4f84a7cbe03c369f04ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has gained unlimited stamina!
Having the ability to Rush indefinitely
is a game changer.
SkillEffect.Hero_EATCARRY_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="f895bc5e3db74b54940112d57cffab88" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has developed more skills!
She can now [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]swallow and transport
[System:Color name="Default"]objects for you.
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV3_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="93b7277089fe41839167a87c92d83c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has developed more skills! She now
has the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin!
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV4_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="313f9b81efc6446d96043cfcd5e88715" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has developed more skills! She now
has the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]20 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin!
SkillEffect.Hero_PUSHLV6_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="0a5ca06e1e3a4b0190715f099bf732ac" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has developed more skills! She now
has the strength of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]100 [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin!
SkillEffect.SkillShop_First time:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="707fb5c9e5dc4ad385f178fb30310571" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This Rescue Pup training curriculum has
been passed down through many
generations.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="707fb5c9e5dc4ad385f178fb30310571" Scale="1"/]If [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Motivation" scale="0.56"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pup Drive[System:Color name="Default"] has built up
sufficiently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he can train and learn
new [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]skills[System:Color name="Default"] without a problem.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="707fb5c9e5dc4ad385f178fb30310571" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]As for what skills to learn and when to
learn them...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that depends on the rescue
approach you two want to take.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="707fb5c9e5dc4ad385f178fb30310571" Scale="1"/]Go the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Buff[System:Color name="Default"] path if you want to carry
heavy things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or go the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Chomp[System:Color name="Default"] path if
taking on creatures is your priority.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="707fb5c9e5dc4ad385f178fb30310571" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]But keep proper Dandori practices in
mind, and think carefully about what will
help you carry out your duties efficiently.
SkillEffect.NUKU_DIGGING_Release:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bedf525751544a83aa4e41cebb0ca9bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Aha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been watching you two
progress...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and you've inspired me to
create a new training course![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bedf525751544a83aa4e41cebb0ca9bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when you're plucking Pikmin
sprouts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I believe [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can help if he
learns [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pluck[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bedf525751544a83aa4e41cebb0ca9bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I've also added some training to beef
up his [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Dig[System:Color name="Default"] skill so he can dig faster
than ever.
SkillEffect.PUSHLV4_Release:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3e7bbc20c16e4b0380611651d6bff35e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Well, well, well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you mastered Buff.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I knew you could do it, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e7bbc20c16e4b0380611651d6bff35e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]That means I'm giving you permission to
learn an even more powerful skill...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Super Buff[System:Color name="Default"]!
SkillEffect.ATTACKLV4_Release:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7703a673833548149256849cc202dad8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Who mastered Chomp?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Was it you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Yes, it was, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It was you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Good boy![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7703a673833548149256849cc202dad8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Now you should be ready to learn an
even more powerful skill...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Big Chomp[System:Color name="Default"]!
SkillEffect.RUSHLV4_Release:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="861244e5fe1e41a1bee4c54052a8f154" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Amazing, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Incredible, even![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'd say you've mastered Rush![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="861244e5fe1e41a1bee4c54052a8f154" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Does that mean you're ready for the
more advanced [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mega Rush[System:Color name="Default"]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I warn
you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]this one's not easy!
